summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Lot One 91) Block 34, Maynard's Plat et al, in the City of Seattle, by filling under Ordinance No. 18707, creating Local Improvement District No. 1802 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
